spell_list.description: Peaceful Aggression is an offensive based spell which grants the Templar a chance to double attack, additional chance to critical hostile spells and improved spell damage and critical amount.  The templar will, however, have longer casting times on heals and also reduced heal effectiveness.
spell_list.description_pvp: Peaceful Aggression is an offensive based spell which grants the Templar a chance to double attack, additional chance to critical hostile spells and improved spell damage and critical amount.  The templar will, however, have longer casting times on heals and also reduced heal effectiveness.

effect_list.description: Improves base auto attack multiplier of caster by 0.112
Increases Multi Attack Chance of caster by 25.0
Increases casting speed of beneficial spells by 30%.
Improves the damage, crit bonus and crit chance of spells and combat arts by 15%.
Reduces the effectiveness of heals by 10%.

spell_list.name: Peaceful Aggression
